longDef.en: one of the independent groups of stars in the universe
a meeting of rich and famous people:
longDef.cn: 人们期待已久的电影首映式今晚举行，一大批影星歌星前来捧场。

examples.en: Present tonight at the long-awaited opening of this film are a whole galaxy of stars from the acting and musical professions.
examples.cn: 人们期待已久的电影首映式今晚举行，一大批影星歌星前来捧场。

longDef.en: the very large group of stars that contains the solar system (= the sun and all the planets, including Earth, that go around it)

examples.en: Jupiter is the biggest planet in our solar system, but not the biggest planet in the Galaxy.
On dark nights with no moon, you can see the Milky Way in the night sky.
Our system is just one of many in the Galaxy that might be able to support life.
